00024 #define BACKSPACE_CHAR  0x08
00025 #define DEL_CHAR        0x7F
00026 #define CLR_CHAR        0x15
00027

00029 static const char * welcomeMessage;
00030 static const char * promptString;
00031 
00032 static char stringBuf[TERM_LINESIZE];

00041 void
00042 TERM_Run(void) {
00043   while(1) {
00044     TERM_GetLine(stringBuf, TERM_LINESIZE);
00045     CMD_RunCommand(stringBuf);
00046   }
00047 }

00057 void
00058 TERM_GetLine(char * string, uint8_t length) {
00059   uint8_t i = 0;
00060   char temp;
00061 
00062   printf("%s", (char *)promptString);
00063 
00064   do{
00065     temp = getchar();
00066     switch(temp) {
00067 
00068       /* End of line found. NULL out and return. */
00069       case '\r':
00070         string[i] = '\0';
00071         putchar('\n');
00072         //puts(string);
00073         return;
00074         /* Not Reached */
00075         break;
00076 
00077       /* Clear line. Erase up to prompt. */
00078       case CLR_CHAR:
00079         while(i) {
00080           putchar(BACKSPACE_CHAR);
00081           putchar(' ');
00082           putchar(BACKSPACE_CHAR);
00083           i--;
00084         }
00085         break;
00086 
00087       case DEL_CHAR: /* Fall through */
00088       case BACKSPACE_CHAR:
00089         if(i) {
00090           putchar(BACKSPACE_CHAR);
00091           putchar(' ');
00092           putchar(BACKSPACE_CHAR);
00093           i--;
00094         }
00095         break;
00096 
00097       /* All others, check for non-special character. */
00098       default:
00099         if(temp >= 0x20 && temp <= 0x7E) {
00100           /* Echo back */
00101           fputc(temp, stdout);
00102 
00103           /* If there's room, store the char, else, backup over it */
00104           if(i<(length-1)) {
00105             string[i] = temp;
00106             i++;
00107           }else{
00108             putchar(BACKSPACE_CHAR);
00109             putchar(' ');
00110             putchar(BACKSPACE_CHAR);
00111           }
00112         }else{
00113           printf("%02X", temp);
00114         }
00115 
00116         break;
00117     }
00118 
00119   }while(1);
00120 }

00132           const char * message, const char * prompt) {
00133
